columns.name: index
columns.meaning: Unique identifier for each row in the dataset.

columns.name: id
columns.meaning: Unique identifier for each beer entry.

columns.name: style
columns.null_value_rule: allowed empty string '' for missing data

columns.name: ounces
columns.meaning: Volume of the beer in ounces.
columns.format_rule: Must be a plain integer without any units or symbols (e.g., 10, 18).

columns.name: abv
columns.format_rule: Must be a plain float with up to 3 decimal places, no % symbols (e.g., 0.021, 0.01).
columns.null_value_rule: allowed empty string '' for missing data

columns.name: ibu
columns.meaning: International Bitterness Unit, possibly with a numeric value.
columns.null_value_rule: allowed empty string '' for missing data

columns.name: brewery_id
columns.meaning: Unique identifier for each brewery entry.

columns.name: brewery_name
columns.meaning: Name of the brewery, possibly with abbreviations or codes derived from other columns (e.g., city).

columns.name: city
columns.meaning: City where the brewery is located.

columns.name: state
columns.meaning: State where the brewery is located.
